channel.title: rat-os/ratos
channel.description: An OS focusing on making klipper more approachable

item.title: Adaptive Mesh: issues should now be solved.
item.description: The issues with BLTouch, Beacon and inverted adaptive prime z_offset issues should now be solved. If you're using adaptive mesh i recommend you refresh the update manager and update RatOS to the latest version.

item.title: Beacon support and native adaptive meshing has landed in RatOS
item.description: When you update RatOS in the machine tab RatOS v2 will have full native support for Beacon (single include) and Adaptive Meshing & Priming (see: https://os.ratrig.com/docs/configuration/adaptive-meshing).
